message.content:
{
  "introText": "Here are 5 facts about unicorns that you may not know!",
  "story": [
    "Unicorns only become visible to humans after they've successfully completed their taxes.",
    "A group of unicorns is called a 'rainbow calamity,' and they meet up annually at disco-themed karaoke night.",
    "Ancient Romans believed in avidicus unicornus, the struggle between good and evil housecat-sized unicorns fighting under couches.",
    "\"Frosted Unicorn Flakes\" was almost the name for a cereal brand, but it was dropped due to glitter shortages during World War II.",
    "In an alternative universe, uni-corgs exist- part corgi & part unicorn. Together, they create magical rainbow lint."
  ],
  "hashtags": "#unicorns #magical #mythicalcreatures"
}
